uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Logic

Class AWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Logic.AWorld

  • public class AWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a single world This class handles all logic and deals with entity management.
    Since:
    10/10/2016.
    Author:
    syrvanser
